resources.string: Verwenden Sie das folgende Formular um mit ERCIS Kontakt aufzunehmen:
Ungültige Email Adresse, bitte versuchen Sie es erneut

Willkommen to the ERCIS App!
 This app informs you about the European Research Center for Information Systems (ERCIS), which is located in the German city Münster. The ERCIS is an international network of scientists, conducting cooperative research in the field of Information Systems. 
 
 To navigate through the app, swipe in the main menu from the left or tap on the ERCIS home icon.
